item.title: Indonesian Bonds Are Top Pick for Schroders on Purbaya, BI Bets
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Schroder Investment Management favors Indonesian bonds and the rupiah as its top picks in Asia, betting that government efforts to boost growth and expectations of further interest-rate cuts will draw foreign inflows. The bullish view comes as new finance minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa...
